Text: New Discount for GSA Contract Cc Britt I know this may seem silly but for the record the electricity discount for all financial and physical commodity deals per the GSA Contract increases to from This means that for all the accounts which we currently service we need to update the computer discount rate from the old rate to the new rate Please give me a call if you have questions and certainly let me know if this is a problem Thanks and I hope your holidays were relaxing Bill

Renewable Invoicing Analysis Cc Roman and Karen Dyaniese put together this great Excel analysis for you which I have reviewed It shows a comparison by billing period of the old invoice without renewable billing with the correct invoice amount with renewable billing The net difference for calenday year through August most up to date info is Please review the analysis If you have questions please give me a call And Dyaniese great work Thanks Bill

GSA CommodityRichard FYIthis should be fun to watch Forwarded by Bill HatchEFSEES on AM Bill Hatch AM To Robert ES cc John ES Steve ES Les ES Bob ES Robert D ES Subject GSA Commodity Per email from Steve I understand that the Service Group is now responsible for the commodity portion of the GSA contract Please let me know to whom I should refer calls of a Service Manager nature re GSA commodity questions Dyaniese Please note that there will be a new person responsible for the management of this commodity account Good luck Bill
Renewable Costs for GSA for FY Richard Is this spreadsheet correct Bill

GSA Green Power Billing Cc Roman Here is the billing summary for green power for FY Both Richard and I have reviewed this and it is correct I still have an expedited request in for the invoicing and hope to have that for you very soon Thanks Bill

Fwd Well go forward from this momentThought you might like this from Leonard Pitts of the Miami Herald Forwarded by Bill HatchHOUEES on PM Tracy Hatch campagnecom on PM Please respond to Tracy Hatch ToBill Barry Edward Bryer G arry ClarkePounder Paul Clark l arklaveycom Brian Law Jeffrey Levine jlev Rick Manganello Tony Martinez Orintha Silva G Frank Teas Brian Law Sy Mahf uz Jack Tulley Jack Atkinson jackatki Jack Law Tom Tessier thom Moe Arel Karen Bill Cathy Duffy Ray Ennis Sr Brian Law om David Pastor Hugh Phillis Marco Rancourt John Sias Tom Tessier Maryse Wirbal Kevi n Halloran Peter Bonnette Car olyn CrowleyMeub Jody Gage Ke n Grabeau Michele McLellan Scott Parol in Bill Pockl Gina Balkus Pat Chadwick Betha ny Compagna Sue Elsass Wi lliam Hatch Henry Kinch Jr us Jennifer Kinch Scott Levesque sncom Nancy Richardson Martha Soper ateway net Stephanie Soper Cindy Stewart Jim Chaloner cc SubjectFwd Well go forward from this moment Although Ive received and read countless emails on Tuesdays tragedy I ha ve forwarded few because I know youre all receiving just as many and oft en the same ones over and over like I am This one however I feel compe lled to forward because it says far better than I ever could how I feel ab out our country and being an American Lile NATO said attack one of us and we put aside our differences and band together stronger than any foe or fear we might face Tracy Date PM From Linda Driscoll Published Wednesday September Well go forward from this moment Leonard J Pitts Jr The Miami Herald Its my job to have something to say They pay me to provide words that help make sense of that which troubles th e American soul But in this moment of airless shock when hot tears sting disbelieving eyes the only thing I can find to say the only words that seem to fit must be addressed to the unknown author of this suffering You monster You beast You unspeakable bastard What lesson did you hope to teach us by your cowards attack on our World Trade Center our Pentagon us What was it you hoped we would learn Whatever it was please know that you failed Did you want us to respect your cause You just damned your cause Did you want to make us fear You just steeled our resolve Did you want to tear us apart You just brought us together Let me tell you about my people We are a vast and quarrelsome family a family rent by racial social political and class division but a family nonetheless Were frivolous yes capable of expending tremendous emotiona l energy on pop cultural minutiae a singers revealing dress a ball team s misfortune a cartoon mouse Were wealthy too spoiled by the ready availability of trinkets and material goods and maybe because of that we walk through life with a certain sense of blithe entitlement We are fundamentally decent though peaceloving and compassionate We struggle to know the right thing and to do it And we are the overwhelming majority of us people of faith believers in a just and loving God Some people you perhaps think that any or all of this makes us weak Youre mistaken We are not weak Indeed we are strong in ways that cannot be measured by arsenals IN PAIN Yes were in pain now We are in mourning and we are in shock Were still grappling with the unreality of the awful thing you did still working to make ourselves understand that this isnt a special effect from some Hollywood blockbuster isnt the plot development from a Tom Clancy novel Both in terms of the awful scope of their ambition and the probable final death toll your attacks are likely to go down as the worst acts of terrorism in the history of the United States and probably the history of the world Youve bloodied us as we have never been bloodied before But theres a gulf of difference between making us bloody and making us fall This is the lesson Japan was taught to its bitter sorrow the last tim e anyone hit us this hard the last time anyone brought us such abrupt and monumental pain When roused we are righteous in our outrage terrible in our force When provoked by this level of barbarism we will bear any suffering pay any cost go to any length in the pursuit of justice I tell you this without fear of contradiction I know my people as you I think do not What I know reassures me It also causes me to tremble with dread of the future In the days to come there will be recrimination and accusation fingers pointing to determine whose failure allowed this to happen and what can be done to prevent it from happening again There will be heightened security misguided talk of revoking basic freedoms Well go forward from this momen t sobered chastened sad But determined too Unimaginably determined THE STEEL IN US You see the steel in us is not always readily apparent That aspect of our character is seldom understood by people who dont know us well On this day the familys bickering is put on hold As Americans we will weep as Americans we will mourn and as Americans we will rise in defense of all that we cherish So I ask again What was it you hoped to teach us It occurs to me that maybe you just wanted us to know the depths of your hatred If thats the case consider the message received And take this message in exchange You dont know my people You dont know what were capable of You dont know what you just started But youre about to learn RFC header ReturnPath Received from relaysancerfnet by mailcampagnecom wi th ESMTP Eudora Internet Mail Server Thu Sep Received from intra fourdavoxcom by relaysancerfnet with SMTP id SAA Thu Sep GMT Received from westntdavoxcom westntdavoxcom by postofficedavoxcom with ESMTP id OAA Thu Sep EDT Received by WESTFORDNT with Internet Mail Service id QVKHN Thu Sep MessageID EDFDBDBDAFAEF ESTFORDNT From Theimer Roxanne To Laurie Eno Home Email Linda Driscoll Work Email Mark Greer Email Maureen OConnor Work Email Carl Theimer Email Charlene Keating Home Email Vicki Home Email Stevens Stephanie Killam Scott Subject Fwd Well go forward from this moment Date Thu Sep MIMEVersion XMailer Internet Mail Service ContentType textplain charsetDiso

RE Conf Call re Invoicing for GSA Renewable PowerOf coursehere it is Bill From Richard nronXgate on AM CDT To Bill ES cc Subject RE Conf Call re Invoicing for GSA Renewable Power Bill If you have the Excel Spreadsheet can you forward to me prior to the meeting Thanks Richard Original Message From Hatch Bill Sent Thursday September AM To Cc Nanof John Ring Richard Subject Conf Call re Invoicing for GSA Renewable Power Dyaniese Per my voice mail I suggest we have a conf call with Richard this afternoon to discuss the GSA renewable billing It is incorrect to charge three GSA accounts for the renewable power The proper GSA Renewable invoicing is as follows Charge JFK Building kwhmonth at cents and kwhmonth at cents This equals kwhmonth and mm kwh per year which is the minimum amount they contracted for The proper Hanscom Air Force Renewable invoicing is as follows Charge only HAFB Acct kwhmonth at cents The problems I see ahead are the adjustments CSC needs to make to past invoices in order to properly recalculate the monthly total consumption price Id like for Richard and me to review with you what CSC now needs to do Will Eastern be ok with you The dial in number is the passcode is Please let me know Thanks Bill

Conf Call re Invoicing for GSA Renewable Power Cc Dyaniese Per my voice mail I suggest we have a conf call with Richard this afternoon to discuss the GSA renewable billing It is incorrect to charge three GSA accounts for the renewable power The proper GSA Renewable invoicing is as follows Charge JFK Building kwhmonth at cents and kwhmonth at cents This equals kwhmonth and mm kwh per year which is the minimum amount they contracted for The proper Hanscom Air Force Renewable invoicing is as follows Charge only HAFB Acct kwhmonth at cents The problems I see ahead are the adjustments CSC needs to make to past invoices in order to properly recalculate the monthly total consumption price Id like for Richard and me to review with you what CSC now needs to do Will Eastern be ok with you The dial in number is the passcode is Please let me know Thanks Bill

Re New Acct Numbersfyi Forwarded by Bill HatchHOUEES on PM Bill Hatch PM To ENRON cc Subject Re New Acct Numbers Dyaniese I forgot that its so close to the end of the fiscal year so no problem with me waiting If I can have it by the end of the week that would be fine On a more important issue I hope you andor Mat is researching how were billing the renewables for the GSA There seems to be a problem Please let me know about the renewabla pricing as soon as you have some information This really is important to the GSA Thanks Bill on PM To cc Subject Re New Acct Numbers Bill I dont know off hand I recognize some of the abbreviations as part of the site addressI simply forwarded a spreadsheet that was given to me If you dont mind waiting until tomorrow or Wednesday I can look them up and send it to you again Its the end of the month end of GSAs fiscal year Im trying to make everybody happy Youre included on that list so Ill make sure I get the info to you asap Thanks Dyaniese on PM To Dyaniese A SC cc Subject Re New Acct Numbers Dyaniese Thanks for the infor but Im having trouble understanding the abreviations What agencies are the following AFRI BOS BOST DORC GENE MAGU Natl US A Please let me know Thanks Bill on PM To Bill Hatch cc Subject Re New Acct Numbers Bill I was extremely busy last week and forgot to send this to you Let me know if you need anything else Thanks Dyaniese See attached file BECO Account Numbersxls Bill Hatch on PM To Dyaniese A SC cc Subject New Acct Numbers Dyaniese Can you send me the guide to the new BECO account numbers What I need are the old numbers by Agency and the corresponding new account numbers Thanks Bill See attached file BECO Account Numbersxls This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to Phyisical Delivery in MA Cc Richard Can you confirm for me that EES is prepared to offer physical delivery of power behind all the UDCs in MA If not all UDCs can you let me know which ones This will be important information for me to know when I discuss the new contract arrangement with the GSA Thanks Bill

DOT Proposal and Interval Data Cc Tonya Any news on a proposal for the DOT Attached are the interval data for the accounts They called yesterday wondering about the proposal Please let me know Thanks Bill Forwarded by Bill HatchHOUEES on PM Bill Hatch PM To Tonya ES cc Richard ES Subject DOT Interval Data Tonya Here is the interval data you requested to do a pricing proposal for DOT behind NSTAR Please let me know if this is sufficient and when we can expect to have a proposal to submit to the GSA Thanks Bill Forwarded by Bill HatchHOUEES on PM on PM To cc Subject DOT Interval Data Bill have not even looked at these passing them on let me know RP Forwarded by Roman J PiaskoskiPMFRGSAGOV on PM DeRusso Cynthia on PM To Costa Thomas cc Milton John Jerz Joseph Subject DOT Interval Data Thom Ive attached spreadsheets containing months of hourly interval data for DOT account The period is from to Account number has contributors of interval data If you have any questions please contact me Cynthia x yyxls yyxls This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager See attached file yyxls See attached file yyxls yyxls yyxls

VAMC Cogen and GSA Commodity Deal Cc Richard In response to your question re how the VA cogen deal affects the supply contract with the GSA I have prepared the attached analysis Part I focuses on the cogen deal part II shows the affect of a new DSM project Im trying to close by end of December Please note that this analysis is a back of the envelop analysis that gives you a logic and scope which can now be fine tuned by the appropriate analyst group The net result is that the existing cogen deal and the proposed new energy deal provides the EES commodity desk mm kWh it can market as Negawatts Based upon assumptions from Enron On Line the market value of these negawatts is mm EFS will be happy to discuss with the desk how we can share this benefit Bill

Negawatts from CogenRichard Here is my first take on the analysis you wanted and acct numbers Please do not show this to anyone before we talk I need to get to a meeting in Boston now so I dont have time to write something up which I need to do So please keep this just between us Ill call you this afternoon Thanks Bill
Wind Farm Cc Roman I talked to Richard and he would be very interested in talking with Dale Osburn Can you send him the number Hope all is well Bill
